name: Wondee
description: Fast arcade action! Race down lines chased by a wall of fire, eat Dots and evade Pointies.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8/10 Processor: Intel Core Duo E6600 2.4GHz (2006 desktop) Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia 7900 GS 256 MB RAM (desktop 2006), NVS Quadro 160M (laptop 2008), or similar DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 200 MB available space
